alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otter Tail and southwestern Becker Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shoreham, or near Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Perham, Frazee, Lake Lida, Star Lake, Big McDonald Lake and Vergas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; West Becker
